方法详细信息

getAllViews

public static java.util.ArrayList<android.view.View> getAllViews(boolean onlySufficientlyVisible)
Returns views from the shown DecorViews.

参数：
onlySufficientlyVisible - if only sufficiently visible views should be returned
返回：
all the views contained in the DecorViews

removeInvisibleViews

public static <T extends android.view.View> java.util.ArrayList<T> removeInvisibleViews(java.util.ArrayList<T> viewList)
Removes invisible Views

参数：
viewList - an ArrayList with Views that is being checked for invisible Views.
返回：
a filtered ArrayList with no invisible Views.

removeUnshownViews

public static <T extends android.view.View> java.util.ArrayList<T> removeUnshownViews(java.util.ArrayList<T> viewList)

filterViews

public static <T extends android.view.View> java.util.ArrayList<T> filterViews(java.lang.Class<?> classToFilterBy,
                                                                               java.util.ArrayList<android.view.View> viewList)
Filters views

参数：
classToFilterBy - the class to filter
viewList - the ArrayList to filter form
返回：
an ArrayList with filtered views

public static void scrollInToScreenIfNeeded(android.app.Instrumentation inst,
